video.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 | Fully Ramblomatic

captions.text: [Music]
[Applause]
I have to admit I was surprised by Call
of Duty Black Ops 6 because I didn&#39;t
know there&#39;d been a Black Ops 5 I
remember Black Ops 4 I remember it
expected us to pay full price for a game
with no story campaign and then I
remember a sort of Red Mist coming down
and then I woke up in a portal wearing a
length of human intestine as a sock hang
on yachs didn&#39;t you pledged to stop
doing Call of Duty after the Modern
Warfare remake and didn&#39;t you skip
laughing from the room as if the burdens
of a generation had been lifted from
your very Soul well a while modern
warfare games still reflect the washed
out masturbation fantasies of neocon
armchair generals the Black Ops
campaigns have historically been more
inclined to let the freak flag fly in
interesting ways and B Black Ops 6 is
set in the &#39;90s an era I actually
remember from before the current age of
[ __ ] so I was hoping it had had a
pleasant nostalgic Vibe and half decent
pop soundtrack to all the extra legal
Foreigner torturing and having played
through the story I got to say there&#39;s
something weirdly offbrand about Black
Ops yes you do get to extra legally
torture a foreigner just once as a treat
and there&#39;s plenty of over-the toop
shouty shootouts against clearly much
poorer equipped enemies but there&#39;s
always a slightly apologetic air to it I
swear all I had to do was spray bullets
vaguely in the direction of the dudes
and their heads popped with little
festive bursts of red smoke to amuse the
children also the overarching stories
about as low effort as this [ __ ] gets we
play as CIA operatives who discover a
plot to take over the world by an evil
sing along if you know the words private
military cooperation who of course have
mysteriously Limitless funding and
Manpower and operate like [ __ ] James
Bond villains and of course they&#39;ve
stolen a the bioweapon that they are of
course planning to drop on civilian
targets and of course they&#39;re being
controlled by a secret mole within the
CIA ooh can I take a guess Black Ops 6 h
which are the only two established CIA
higher up characters could it be the one
that your allies keep suggesting might
be the traitor who was a bit of an
[ __ ] in his opening angry police
chief yoose Canon Black Ops hand over
your badge and gun scene or is it the
one who&#39;s ostensibly on our side and
been nothing but smiles and peach
cobbler but has to stay at HQ for
unclear reasons and takes a weirdly
large amount of personal time off no I
didn&#39;t drop a spoiler warning because I
respect your [ __ ] intelligence but
overarching story straight from to make
your own Call of Duty plot paint by
numbers kit aside the odd thing about
the campaign is I swear every Mission
came from a different [ __ ] game it
starts with a standard Call of Duty
committing war crimes in the Middle East
Adventure but then switches to a
stealthy assassination mission not
unheard of in the spunk garle weee
Realms but next we left turn into a sort
of Hitman area where we infiltrate a
political event trying to isolate a
single Target through a choice of manyi
objectives where there&#39;s a nice Bill
Clinton Cameo but sadly no opportunity
to shoot him in the bell end and change
the entire course of modern history then
the game turns Flatout open world Hors
for a single chapter not in a hugely
elaborate way more like a hell divers 2
two square miles of desert three
objectives to blow up 10 or 11 bonus
activities and one slightly bored yachy
cocho cuz it&#39;s all rather one note the
enemy presence gradually ramps up but
none of it makes it that much harder to
creep in from an unexpected angle glue a
C4 to the Target like a traffic cop
dropping a parking ticket and then creep
back out again then the developers
either got really poured or ran out of
rittle and flavored rice krispies cuz
next is a [ __ ] sci-fi survival horror
level set in a disused research facility
where we get a face full of scarecrow
fear Toxin and have to locate four key
cards while fighting off Undead Horrors
and mannequin monsters we return to the
real world just in time for an Oceans 11
style Casino Heist and another wild spin
on the wheel of emotional tones the
whole game culminates in the main
villain having to go through a surreal
nightmare world based on their
subconscious mind solving Silent Hill
puzzles and fighting evil clones of
themselves altogether it feels like a
game made by developers who would rather
have been making literally anything but
a Call of Duty game and I guess that
makes us of a like mind cuz I didn&#39;t
want to play one either oh YSI are you
starting to encroach upon a
recommendation for Black Ops 6 dare we
dream no it&#39;s [ __ ] moronic the
variety smas board approach to game
design means every individual element is
throwaway and teaspoon shallow the
research facility level introduces this
whole plot point where the main
character is secretly a bioengineered
super soldier or something which had
never come up before and doesn&#39;t really
go anywhere also you get a grappling
hook for this level which I&#39;d normally
appreciate but it&#39;s only for this level
and never again and I find that
offensive frankly it&#39;s like taking an
animal conservationist to a circus to
watch the dancing bear the character
focused on during the weird Psychonauts
mental journey level is one who&#39;s had
all of about 10 minutes of screen time
up to then so we have to cram a tragic
backstory Vision Quest and Redemption
Arc into about half an hour of gameplay
then at the very end we learn that the
stock bad guys have planted the stock
super weapon in the stock capital
building so I&#39;m thinking okay gunfight
in well-known location at the heart of
American national identity guess book
ending things with standard Call of Duty
operating procedur is a good way to wrap
things up and the game goes yes I
suppose it would have been anyway the
end the bomb got diffused off screen
good job have you tried zombie mode
actually that&#39;s not quite the end we
have to have one last scene with [ __ ]
Superior you&#39;re a loose cannon police
chief dude so he can go I&#39;m sorry Black
Ops you were right all along thank you
for saving the world from the evil Rogue
unac accountable branch of the CIA now
please form your own Rogue unac
accountable branch of the CIA and Pinky
promis not to turn evil this time I&#39;d
record it completely lacking in
self-awareness but the chapter with Bill
Clinton ends with main characters
escaping from a police Siege on a pair
of American flag decorated motorbikes
that just happen to be there fully
gassed up and under a [ __ ] Spotlight
and that doesn&#39;t feel like something an

well and Infinity Ward and Raven
software Sledgehammer Games demonware
High Moon Studios and Activision shankai
well that rather sheds light and
beo well that rather sheds light on the
situation here clear all 47 development
teams worked on a different part of the
game and weren&#39;t allowed to talk to each
other you know I&#39;m not too proud to
admit I enjoyed bits of the Black Ops 6
campaign I assume that was the point
toate to as many disperate tastes as
possible but I&#39;d have respected it more
if it had picked a lane I worry about
your self-esteem Call of Duty you should
try to be the best damn Call of Duty you
can be not a little bit of Hitman
Splinter Cell Psychonauts Payday 2
control and Hell divers what are you a
